description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Decorate gingerbread houses with your avatar in a wacky physics environment. Play with friends to decorate faster or throw snowballs to mess up their decorating. Construct icing, nut and candy structures to stand on, bounce on marshmallows from rooftop to rooftop, or play with the snow. Come and play!
description.short: Decorate gingerbread houses with your avatar in a wacky physics environment. Play with friends to decorate faster or throw snowballs to mess up their decorating. Construct icing, nut and candy structures to stand on, bounce on marshmallows from rooftop to rooftop, or play with the snow. Come and play!
